0.body:
For scoring, keep components within your play area or directly above it, on your player board.

Play area lines can be redrawn with Rewind Time.

Flip your tent tile face-down to automatically pass your turn until the next round. (Flip your tent face-up to undo).

Left/Right-click resource counters to take/spend resources.

Clicking the Buy button on an empty card space will refill the card row.

Adventurer - the easiest way to discover a site with choice of two site cards:
1. Flip top two cards of the site deck.
2. Return one on top and the other on bottom (with right-click menu).
3. Click the '+Site & Guardian' button on the site.

To manually discover a site, the site card must be locked first before placing the guardian on top. To remove a site, unlock the site card.
0.title: Notes

1.body:
Buy buttons - exile a card and refill the card row.

Take buttons (Professor leader) - move tablet and compass tokens to the suitcase.

Assistant piles (context menu action) - take the top assistant and put it on the bottom of its pile.

Sites and guardians (context menu action) - send to the bottom of the appropriate deck.

Research bonus tiles (context menu action) - send to trash.

Cards and fear tokens (context menu action) - exile.

The Mystic should place Fear cards and tokens onto the ritual pile manually.
1.title: Right-Clicks

2.body:
The artifact 'War Mask' in your play area will prevent you from getting Fear from guardians at the end of the round, but only if it is face-up and not stacked with other cards.

If you played War Mask NOT for its effect, flip it face-down or stack it with other cards.
2.title: War Mask

3.body:
Select a color other than Red and start the game. Solo options will appear after normal setup.

The rival will take its first turn each round automatically. Click the Rival Turn button to execute subsequent turns.

The rival makes its selections at random instead of using action deck arrows.

Flip objective cards face-down when you complete them. You may delete the rival's temple tiles if it completes objectives that you forgot to flip over.

The rival will continue to take turns if your tent tile is face-down.

Avoid rewinding time into the middle of the rival's turn - rewind time further into the middle of yours.
3.title: Solo Mode
